title: Riot doing something about ranked AFK's instead of new champions and dumb stuff like that
body: I've been playing since season 2 and league has come quite far. However even after 3 seasons I have yet to see and improvements in the afk system. Sure u can encourage people to leave games less frequently however you should also compensate their team members. Instead of doing things like new champions and trying to empty our pockets, how about you actually try doing something for the community and its players?

replies.body:
Hey Luxis Skuxx,


As this is a discussion pertaining to one of the Player Behavior & Reform systems [LeaverBuster] in League of Legends, the best place for this discussion would be the [**Player Behavior & Moderation**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) sub-boards.
